Inside the Ark, Quickstride gets the message, and is swift to locate a manu=
al control for the doors, and swiftly activates it by slamming a palm again=
st the main manual controller.

"Read ya loud'n clear Torca, I got it!  No =
one's commn' in or outa here unless they wanna risk their sorry afts ta do =
so."

He then transforms into beast mode, and rears up.

" I got more kick =
power in this mode.  Hooves are geat defense weapons, 'specially when ya wa=
nna strike a bot below the belt, if ya know what I mean, Torca.  

He charg=
es in beast mode toward his enemys, at a strong trot and hefty snort.

Outs=
ide the Ark, Rat Trap clings to Night Shift with his dear life, fearing tha=
t their distraction may not be enough to foil the sweeps.

" Slag! They cau=
ght onta us!  Now what?!"

He screaches to Night Shift as he dodges the bla=
sts on screeching tires.

"I dunno Rat trap, I'm go'n as fast as I can!  I'=
m not a speedster, I'm an off roader.... Waaaaiiiit, that's it...  We all k=
now that jets can't fly in heavy vegitation right?"

Rat Trap nodds.

"Uh h=
uh, Oh, I get it, well ya better do it fast buddy or else we're done for!"
=

Night Shift chuckles.

"Better get inside, it's a lot more fun when you're=
 buckled in."

Rat Trap quickly gets inside, and settles himself in the dri=
ver's seat, resorting to robot mode, buckling the seat belt.

"Heeey, you'r=
e right, it is a lot more fun in the driver's seat. "

Night Shift turns of=
f the beaten path, and heads down a rather steep slope, as his tires roll o=
ver rough terrain, heading right for a patch of heavy vegitation.  His susp=
ension system is now put to the test as he rolls along without a worry in t=
he world, knowing that perhaps this would prove difficult for a sweep to fo=
llow him in such thick brush cover. 

"Okay, hopefully this will get those =
air heads off our tail pipe."

Back at the Ark, Tucson realizes that he's l=
ost Nightrazor for the moment, and decides not to try a shot at him.  Inste=
ad, he concentrates and decides it's best to just follow him.  Yet he wante=
d Nightrazor to know he was there.  But without a fix on him, he had to sta=
rt from scratch.

" All right, I never said this was going to be easy. Sorr=
y Straight Shot, but I believe he's on the move again."

Straight Shot goes=
 along with him.

"No probs, things happen.  Now what?

Tucson narrows a br=
ow.

" We play his game.  I have control of the PA system in the Ark, so it=
's time he knew who he was up against.  I also had time to anaylize who he =
is.  Name is Nightrazor, one of Cyclonus's Ninjabots.  It came up on my int=
el search system."

He turns on the PA on his gauntlett.

"  Don't make thi=
s harder than it has to be, Nightrazor."

He narrows his optics.

"That's i=
t, if Sonar is the only way to stop him then so be it."

Straight Shot sque=
als.

"Oh no, not again, that last one really hurt."

He sighs.

"Sorry, I =
have to."

With a look of sheer determination, he again activates a sonar w=
ave formidable enough to rattle the relays of any bot around.  He realized =
he could not let go of his sonar attack, due to the fact it was the only wa=
y to capture Nightrazor.

"I'm tired of antics, and I'm tired of games!  Th=
is is OUR Ark and it's MY duty to keep it safe!  And safe it will be!"

It =
was clear that Tucson was truely losing his temper.  Through his injuries, =
he remains strong, stubborn and resolute.  There would be no stopping him f=
rom protecting his comrades, and his base.  And there would be no stopping =
him from protecting the bodies of the Autobots who have yet to awaken many =
years afterwards.

" Rodimus, I need you to concentrate your vigil over the=
 sleeping Autobots!  And be sure no harm comes to Optimus Prime!  I have a =
feeling that Nightrazor, our so called intruder has been sent here to destr=
oy his body and those of our sleeping comrades!  If one Autobot is touched,=
 do not hesitate to do the same to a Decepticon!  It's a life for a life an=
d I'm NOT taking anyone's scrap anymore!"

He transmits to Torca and the ot=
her Maximals.

"Torca, if you can hear me, I need you and the others to bar=
e down on Hydras and the other predacons with no holds barred!  That means,=
 if they take anyone's life, or attempt to, return the favor at will!  They=
 want to play rough, they got it!  Because if they think we're going to fal=
l to them, THEY'RE SADLY MISTAKEN!"

He slams a foot down hard, and at the =
same time, lets loose another round of formidable sonar waves.

appens :)

> BIC:
> 
> Outside the Ark the battle is picking up speed, th=
e Maximals bringing
> everything they have to bear against the Predacons!
>=
 
> This is the scene that greets Wing Caliber and Quickstrike as they emer=
ge
> from the Ark and into the combat - one of complete mayhem! Two of the =
most
> powerful Predacons to date are moving against the Ark, Hydras and Cy=
clonus!
> And they are not alone as Predacons of all sorts follow them, len=
ding their
> destructive energies to the battle!
> 
> Torca, as the highest=
 ranking Maximal on the field was attempting to bring
> order to the chaos!=
 HoweverTorca is blown his off his feet and sent
> sprawling to the ground =
by a blast from Cyclonus. The stalwart
> Maximal continued giving orders as=
 he attempted to return fire.
> 
> "Wing Caliber, Quickstrike!" Torca's boo=
ming voice echoed across the
> communication channel. "The automatic contro=
ls are offline, get the Ark door
> closed. We don't want any of these piece=
s of scrap getting inside the Ark!"
> 
> Meanwhile Noctorro, Airhammer and =
Quicksilver did what they could to harass
> the other fliers like Waspinato=
r, Deepstryke and even Cyclonus while Bantor
> entered the fray with a wild=
 abandon as he leaped after Hydras, hoping to
> distract him long enough to=
 allow the others to come in.
> 
> Kup's blasts are powerful as he attempte=
d to fire at the sweeps as well.
> However what he got in return was severa=
l shots from Scourge as he lined up
> on the Autobot. "Foolish prey!" Scour=
ge said as he came around for another
> run, his auto canons opening fire o=
n Kup!
> 
> Meanwhile as the sweeps came after Nightshift and Ratrap, Night=
shift
> transformed into his SUV mode and began zipping through enemy fire =
hoping to
> dodge the well aimed blasts of the sweeps. However the sweeps a=
re designed
> to capture pray, and so as Nighshift picks up speed, the swee=
ps quickly
> oblige the Maximals by firing sizzling hot disintegration beam=
s at them as
> they fly after them!

> INSIDE THE ARK:
> 
> > <OLD>
> >
>=
 > Elita noded and Took ramulus's hand, she was unusually quiet.
> 
> <NEW>=

> 
> Ramulus looked at Elita, "I will protect you. I promise. Your father =
has to
> defend the Ark."
> 
> Meanwhile Rodimus gave Elita one last squeez=
e and then transformed. With a
> screeching noise Rodimus took off for the =
front door. It was time to join
> the battle in earnest!
> 
> 
> Meanwhile =
at the same time Tuscon was still continuing his search, using his
> sonar =
to attempt to locate the intruder. A small blip appeared on his
> screen, a=
lerting him to the possible location of the intruder. Long years of
> steal=
th training are readying him for this moment as he moves forward,
> trying =
to listen for the smallest sound, feeling for the smallest vibration.
> Unf=
ortunately Tuscon's armor is heavier than it once was, slowing him. While
>=
 he is far more durable than he once was, moving silently and stealthily is=

> not an easy task, especially with his injuries. But he took his moment t=
o
> ready himself . . .
> 
> > <OLD>
> >
> > "Steady Straight Shot. We need=
 to make this count."
> >
> > Straight Shot programs her mechanisms for opt=
imal effeciency.
> >
> > " Talk about a shot in the dark. Okay, let's do th=
is."
> 
> <NEW>
> 
> Even as Tuscon uttered those words he could hear a sma=
ll whisper from
> somewhere in the dark. "AHH yes, the wave is gone . . . F=
INALLY!"
>
